UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Broad-spectrum hybrid antimicrobial peptides derived from PMAP-23 with potential LPS binding ability.
Literature.Author: Lyu Y, Tan M, Xue M, Hou W, Yang C, Shan A, Xiang W, Cheng B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=64µM)
